verses.text: \w After|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="G4521"\w*, \w at|strong="G1519"\w* \w dawn|strong="G2020"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w first|strong="G1520"\w* \w day|strong="G4521"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w week|strong="G4521"\w*,\f + \fr 28:1 \ft Literally Now after the Sabbaths, it being dawn toward the first of the Sabbaths,\f* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w Magdalene|strong="G3094"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w other|strong="G1161"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w went|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w see|strong="G2334"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* tomb.

\w Suddenly|strong="G2400"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w earthquake|strong="G4578"\w*, \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w an|strong="G2532"\w* \w angel|strong="G2597"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w descended|strong="G2597"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w rolled|strong="G3037"\w* away \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w stone|strong="G3037"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w on|strong="G1537"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w His|strong="G2532"\w* \w appearance|strong="G2397"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w like|strong="G5613"\w* lightning, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G2532"\w* \w clothes|strong="G1742"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w white|strong="G3022"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w snow|strong="G5510"\w*.

\w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w guards|strong="G5083"\w* trembled \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w became|strong="G1096"\w* \w like|strong="G5613"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w men|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* angel \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w women|strong="G1135"\w*, “\w Do|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w be|strong="G3361"\w* \w afraid|strong="G5399"\w*, \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w I|strong="G1161"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w looking|strong="G2212"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w*.

\w He|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w here|strong="G5602"\w*; \w He|strong="G3588"\w* \w has|strong="G3708"\w* \w risen|strong="G1453"\w*, \w just|strong="G2531"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w He|strong="G3588"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*! \w Come|strong="G1205"\w*, \w see|strong="G3708"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w where|strong="G3699"\w* \w He|strong="G3588"\w* \w lay|strong="G2749"\w*.\f + \fr 28:6 \ft BYZ and TR where the Lord lay\f*

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w quickly|strong="G5035"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w tell|strong="G3004"\w* \w His|strong="G1519"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, ‘\w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w has|strong="G3708"\w* \w risen|strong="G1453"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w going|strong="G4198"\w* \w ahead|strong="G4254"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*. \w There|strong="G1563"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w see|strong="G3708"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*.’ \w See|strong="G3708"\w*, \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w told|strong="G3004"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.”

\w So|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w hurried|strong="G3326"\w* \w away|strong="G3326"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w tomb|strong="G3419"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ran|strong="G5143"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* tell \w His|strong="G2532"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*.

\w Suddenly|strong="G2400"\w* \f + \fr 28:9 \ft BYZ and TR They were going to tell His disciples, and suddenly\f* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w met|strong="G5221"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w Greetings|strong="G5463"\w*!” \w They|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*, grasped \w His|strong="G3708"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w worshiped|strong="G4352"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*.

“\w Do|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w afraid|strong="G5399"\w*,” \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*. “\w Go|strong="G5217"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w tell|strong="G3004"\w* \w My|strong="G3708"\w* brothers \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w go|strong="G5217"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*. \w There|strong="G1563"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w see|strong="G3708"\w* \w Me|strong="G1473"\w*.” The Report of the Guards

\w While|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* women \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w their|strong="G1519"\w* \w way|strong="G4198"\w*, \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G5100"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* guards \w went|strong="G4198"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* reported \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* chief priests \w all|strong="G1161"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G3588"\w* \w happened|strong="G1096"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w chief|strong="G2532"\w* priests \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w met|strong="G4863"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* formed \w a|strong="G2532"\w* plan, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w large|strong="G2425"\w* \w sum|strong="G2425"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* money

\w and|strong="G2064"\w* instructed \w them|strong="G3588"\w*: “\w You|strong="G3754"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, ‘\w His|strong="G3754"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w by|strong="G3004"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w and|strong="G2064"\w* \w stole|strong="G2813"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w away|strong="G2813"\w* \w while|strong="G2837"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w asleep|strong="G2837"\w*.’

\w If|strong="G1437"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* report reaches \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w governor|strong="G2232"\w*, \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w satisfy|strong="G4160"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w keep|strong="G4160"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w out|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* trouble.”

\w So|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* guards \w took|strong="G2983"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* money \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w instructed|strong="G1321"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w account|strong="G3056"\w* \w has|strong="G3778"\w* \w been|strong="G2532"\w* circulated \w among|strong="G3844"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w very|strong="G2532"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*. The Great Commission (Mark 16:14–18)

\w Meanwhile|strong="G1161"\w*, \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w eleven|strong="G1733"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w went|strong="G4198"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w mountain|strong="G3735"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w designated|strong="G5021"\w*.

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w worshiped|strong="G4352"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w some|strong="G3588"\w* \w doubted|strong="G1365"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w All|strong="G3956"\w* \w authority|strong="G1849"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* \w has|strong="G2532"\w* \w been|strong="G2532"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Me|strong="G1325"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w make|strong="G1519"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3100"\w* \f + \fr 28:19 \ft Literally Having gone, therefore, make disciples\f* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w nations|strong="G1484"\w*, baptizing \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Holy|strong="G4151"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*,

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w teaching|strong="G1321"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w obey|strong="G5083"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w commanded|strong="G1781"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* surely \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w always|strong="G3956"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w end|strong="G4930"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* age.”
